typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,struct FixedPoint.Signed memory,struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory) pure returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory,struct FixedPoint.Signed memory)
function (uint256,struct FixedPoint.Signed memory,struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory) pure returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory,struct FixedPoint.Signed memory)

returns._0: uint for the current Testable timestamp.

setCurrentTime(uint256).details: Will revert if not running in test mode.

params.time: timestamp to set current Testable time to.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current time. Will return the last time set in `setCurrentTime` if running in test mode. Otherwise, it will return the block timestamp.
